item.title: Need help about changing text color and a flashing |
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

[u][b]1)How could I change the colours?

How/where can I change colour of the text and username?

2)Im using RichScape PK v3 client, and it only has flashing “|” behind the username…
How could I get it to password and IP too?
I think the code is in there somewhere…

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffff00, c / 2, anInt939, aString1267, j - 7, true); j += 15; } siteOpened = false; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffFF, "@red@Username ~ @whi@ " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "@red@Password ~ @whi@ " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@red@Server IP ~@whi@ " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; if(!flag) { int i1 = c / 2 - 80; int l1 = c1 / 2 + 50;

If you do not know how to help, can you please post me some URLs that help?
I tried search, but i got alot of dif topics…[/b][/u]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help about changing text color and a flashing |
